description:
Keep your teeth feeling smooth and clean, without worrying about squishable tubes of toothpaste or liquids at the airport.

  • Simply chew a tablet and start brushing, the fluoride free ingredients and organic spearmint extract will do the rest
  • Ingredients: calcium carbonate, sodium bicarbonate, xylitol, potassium bitartrate (cream of tartar), *spearmint flavour, *peppermint flavour, gum arabic, sel marin (sea salt), menthol, magnesium stearate, silica. *organic ingredient
  • Fluoride and gluten free
  • Contains approximately 80 tablets (packaged by weight)
  • Vegan
name: Crush  & Brush Mint Toothpaste Tablets
